question: regarding dreams early in the morning, im a 13 year old girl and I was wonderin' if it is true dat dreams seen in the morning around fajr comes true
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
There is no general principle that dreams seen in the morning are certainly true, also depends on the type of the dream as well.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
